p: A live-attenuated MP-12 RVFV strain has been developed as a vaccine; the vaccine has been shown to protect bovine and ovine dams against RVFV challenge and is safe and efficacious for use in neonatal calves and lambs (Morril et al. 1997) . Another live attenuated RVFV vaccine lacking the NSs and NSm genes cannot be transmitted by mosquitoes (Bird et al. 2011; Crabtree et al. 2012).
